## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                      | Type     | Default                 |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------- | -------- | ----------------------- |
| `label`  | `label`   | Label text to show on the button | `string` | `'Default button text'` |


## Events

| Event     | Description                               | Type               |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
